title: Ransomware Detected on 5 Endpoints
description: Multiple endpoints in the Finance department have been infected with ransomware. File encryption activity detected across network shares.

title: Critical Data Breach Detected
description: Unauthorized access to sensitive customer database detected

title: Credential Compromise - Lateral Movement
description: Suspicious login activity detected from multiple locations using compromised credentials with evidence of lateral movement.

title: Phishing Email Campaign Detected
description: Multiple users have received and potentially clicked on malicious phishing emails containing credential harvesting links.

title: Advanced Persistent Threat Detected
description: Sophisticated threat actor with advanced evasion techniques detected. Evidence of lateral movement, persistence mechanisms, and covert reconnaissance activity.

title: Data Breach - Customer Records Exfiltrated
description: Unauthorized data exfiltration detected. Customer personal information and financial records have been accessed and transmitted to external servers.

title: DDoS Attack - Service Disruption
description: Distributed denial of service attack targeting web services. Network saturation and service unavailability affecting business operations.

title: Insider Threat - Unusual Access Pattern
description: Abnormal user access patterns detected. Employee accessing sensitive data outside normal hours with unusual download activity and privilege escalation attempts.
